text:
Ahaha,
the training camp is so much fun~â™ª

Even after lessons,
I'm still full of energy.

I'm not tired at all!
It's like I have endless energy!

Well, maybe I'm just getting too
excited and losing track of things.

You know, when we all practice together, it feels like
our emotions are connecting, like telepathy or something.

It's like feeling so good that
you just can't stop moving.
Yeah, it feels like I could keep going forever!

Haha...
Well, as long as you're energetic, that's what matters.
